T02TD2871E:212a-1: badzra p'a ni s'a dha nam n'a ma /
T02TD2871E:212a-3: phyag na rdo rje sgrub pa'i thabs zhes bya ba /
T02TD2871E:212a-4: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje h'um la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD2871E:212a-5: dpal ldan sangs rgyas 'dus pa'i sku //
T02TD2871E:212a-6: gdug pa 'dul mdzad sbrul sogs brgyan //
T02TD2871E:212a-8: de yi sgrub thabs bri bar bya //
T02TD2871E:212a-9: bcom ldan rdo rje 'dzin pa yi //
T02TD2871E:212a-10: sgrub thabs kyi ni go rims rnams //
T02TD2871E:212a-11: bla ma ji ltar gsungs pa ltar //
T02TD2871E:212a-12: man ngag brjed byang du bkol la //
T02TD2871E:212a-13: khro bo'i rgyal po bsnyen 'dod pas //
T02TD2871E:212a-14: gnas ni dur khrod shing gcig gam //
T02TD2871E:212a-15: yang na rdo rje 'dzin pa'i khyim //
T02TD2871E:212a-16: bkra shis nyams dga'i gnas dag tu //
T02TD2871E:212a-17: mandal sngon po legs byas la //
T02TD2871E:212a-18: me tog la sogs mchod rdzas dgram //
T02TD2871E:212a-19: bde ba'i stan la rab 'dug ste //
T02TD2871E:212a-20: gdong la sogs pa khrus byas la //
T02TD2871E:212a-21: skad cig ma yi ting 'dzin gyis //
T02TD2871E:212a-22: h'um yig las ni mdog nag pa /
T02TD2871E:212a-23: khro bo'i rgyal po rab bsgoms te //
T02TD2871E:212a-24: dpa' ba'i nyams gyis yungs kar la //
T02TD2871E:212a-25: skad cig ma yi ting 'dzin gyis //
T02TD2871E:212a-26: sngags bzlas khro bo'i sprul pa spro //
T02TD2871E:212a-27: gdug pa tshar bcad tshur 'dus pas //
T02TD2871E:212a-28: rdo rje gur dang ra bar gyur //
T02TD2871E:212a-29: de nas rang gi snying gar ni //
T02TD2871E:212a-30: aa dkar zhu bas zla ba yi //
T02TD2871E:212a-31: dkyil 'khor nya gang lta bur bsam //
T02TD2871E:212a-32: de steng h'um sngon zhu ba las //
T02TD2871E:212a-33: rdo rje sngon po rtse lnga bsam //
T02TD2871E:212a-34: de yi bum par h'um sngon po //
T02TD2871E:212a-36: sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' dang /
T02TD2871E:212a-37: lhag pa'i lha dang bla ma rnams //
T02TD2871E:212a-38: spyan drangs mdun gyi mkha' la bzhugs //
T02TD2871E:212a-39: bsod nams tshogs ni bsags pa'i phyir //
T02TD2871E:212a-40: phyag 'tshal mchod sbyin sdig bshags rnams //
T02TD2871E:212a-41: bdun po yongs su bdag pa yi //
T02TD2871E:212a-42: tshig tu brjod de tshogs bsags bya //
T02TD2871E:212a-43: spyan drangs rnams ni gshegs su gsol //
T02TD2871E:212a-44: de nas ye shes tshogs bsags phyir //
T02TD2871E:212a-45: phyi nang snod bcud 'od zhu nas //
T02TD2871E:212a-46: bdag nyid kyi ni thugs kar thim //
T02TD2871E:212a-48: h'um zhu zla tshes thig ler thim //
T02TD2871E:212a-49: chos rnam rang bzhin rnam dag pa'i //
T02TD2871E:212a-50: ngo bo nyid las byung ba yi //
T02TD2871E:212b-0: sngags @212b 'di yang dag brjod par bya //
T02TD2871E:212b-1: aom ma h'a sh'u n+ya t'a dzny'a na badzra sva bh'a ba a'atma konya\ham /
T02TD2871E:212b-2: tshig gi don dang bcas par bsgom //
T02TD2871E:212b-3: chu las chu bur rdo ba'i tshul //
T02TD2871E:212b-4: yam las rlung gi dkyil 'khor de //
T02TD2871E:212b-5: ram las me yi kha dog lnga //
T02TD2871E:212b-6: dbus su pam las padma bsam //
T02TD2871E:212b-7: aa las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor ro //
T02TD2871E:212b-8: de yi steng du h'um sngon las //
T02TD2871E:212b-9: de zhu rdo rje sngon po ni //
T02TD2871E:212b-11: de yi bum par h'um sngon bsam //
T02TD2871E:212b-12: de las 'od zer h'um phra mo //
T02TD2871E:212b-13: 'phros nas phyi nang snod bcud sbyangs //
T02TD2871E:212b-14: tshur 'dus rdo rje phra mor gyur //
T02TD2871E:212b-15: sngar gyi gnas su thim pa las //
T02TD2871E:212b-16: de zhu rdo rje sngon po ni //
T02TD2871E:212b-17: nam mkha'i mtha' dang mnyam par bsam //
T02TD2871E:212b-18: de yi bum dkyil h'um sngon las //
T02TD2871E:212b-19: sku mdog nam mkha'i mdog can la //
T02TD2871E:212b-20: de las 'od byung bcud sbyangs te //
T02TD2871E:212b-21: tshur 'dus phyag na rdo rje yi //
T02TD2871E:212b-22: sku ni phra mo'i tshul du 'dus //
T02TD2871E:212b-23: de las phyag na rdo rje'i sku //
T02TD2871E:212b-24: mdo nas ji ltar gsungs bzhin bsgoms //
T02TD2871E:212b-25: de nas dam tshig sems dpa'i sku //
T02TD2871E:212b-26: bsnyen pa'i dus su bsgom pa ni //
T02TD2871E:212b-27: sku mdog nam mkha'i 'od can la //
T02TD2871E:212b-28: zhal gcig phyag kyang gnyis pa ste //
T02TD2871E:212b-29: spyan dmar mche ba gtsigs pa la //
T02TD2871E:212b-30: phyag g-yas rdo rje g-yon sdigs mdzub //
T02TD2871E:212b-31: shin tu gdug cing khros pa ste //
T02TD2871E:212b-32: klu chen brgyad kyis rnam par brgyan //
T02TD2871E:212b-33: stong g-yogs sngon po legs bsnams shing //
T02TD2871E:212b-34: na bza' chos gos sngon po 'chang //
T02TD2871E:212b-35: smad g-yogs ba ti khra bo dang //
T02TD2871E:212b-36: stag gi smad g-yogs seng stod g-yogs //
T02TD2871E:212b-37: nyi zla'i steng na gar byed dgyes //
T02TD2871E:212b-38: bdag nyid dang ni sprul rgyan gyi //
T02TD2871E:212b-39: kha nas ha ha'i sgra sgrogs pas//
T02TD2871E:212b-41: de ltar khro bo'i rgyal por ni //
T02TD2871E:212b-42: bdag nyid rnam par bsam par bya //
T02TD2871E:212b-43: bdag nyid dam tshig sems dpa' yi //
T02TD2871E:212b-44: thugs kar zla ba rdo rje h'um //
T02TD2871E:212b-46: thugs kar nyi ma rdo rje h'um //
T02TD2871E:212b-47: sran ma nas tshad yungs 'bru la //
T02TD2871E:212b-48: rtsa ba'i sngags kyis bskor bar bsam //
T02TD2871E:212b-49: rdo rje go cha'i phyag rgya yis //
T02TD2871E:212b-50: gnas lngar gtug cing lus bsrung bya //
T02TD2871E:212b-51: nam: sa manta badzr'a n'am ka ba tsa h'um /
T02TD2871E:212b-52: rdo rje rtse lnga'i phyag rgya yis //
T02TD2871E:212b-53: sngags 'di brjod de brtan par bsam //
T02TD2871E:212b-54: na ma: sa manta badzr'a n'am badzra tsanda mah'a ro sha n'a ya h'um /
T02TD2871E:213a-3: 'od zer lcags kyu'i dbyibs byung nas //
T02TD2871E:213a-4: ye shes sems dpa' spyan drangs te //
T02TD2871E:213a-5: 'og min gnas mchog dam pa yi //
T02TD2871E:213a-6: lcang lo can gyi pho brang nas //
T02TD2871E:213a-7: sangs rgyas kun gyis rjes gnang ba'i //
T02TD2871E:213a-8: gsang bdag 'phags pa gos sngon can //
T02TD2871E:213a-10: 'dir gshegs mchod pa dam pa bzhes //
T02TD2871E:213a-11: aom n'i l'am bar dha ra badzra p'a ni sa ma ya manda la ma dhe a'a gatstsha ya /
T02TD2871E:213a-16: aa ba lo k'a ya h'um dza: mdun gyi nam mkhar bzhugs par bsam //
T02TD2871E:213a-17: snying ga'i lha mo'i tshogs kyis mchod //
T02TD2871E:213a-18: aom n'i l'am bar dha ra badzra p'a ni /
T02TD2871E:213a-19: badzra pushpe p'u dza ma gha sa mu dra sphar na sa ma ye h'um /
T02TD2871E:213a-24: badzra g'i ti ga ta ga ta h'um sv'ah'a /
T02TD2871E:213a-25: sngags dang tshigs bcad rab brjod pas //
T02TD2871E:213a-26: dngos sam yid kyis mchod pa dbul //
T02TD2871E:213a-27: de nas bstod dang phrin las bcol //
T02TD2871E:213a-28: mdun du gta' yi gtor ma la //
T02TD2871E:213a-29: aa las bandha gzhal yas khang //
T02TD2871E:213a-30: thun mong gdan dang nyi ma'i steng //
T02TD2871E:213a-31: h'um yig las ni mdog gang pa //
T02TD2871E:213a-32: las kyi sems dpar bskyed par bya //
T02TD2871E:213a-33: ri rab chen po'i lho shar nas //
T02TD2871E:213a-34: lcang lo can gyi bskul tshig dang //
T02TD2871E:213a-35: sngags dang phyag rgyas spyan drangs bstim //
T02TD2871E:213a-36: mchod dang sdig bshags la sogs bya //
T02TD2871E:213a-37: dza:h'um bam ho: zhes pa yis //
T02TD2871E:213a-38: ye shes sems dpa' bstim pa bya //
T02TD2871E:213a-39: spyi bo mgrin pa snying gar ru //
T02TD2871E:213a-40: aom a'a:h'um gsum rab bkod de //
T02TD2871E:213a-41: yi ge bcu gsum 'khor lo bsgom //
T02TD2871E:213a-42: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta k'a ya b'a ka tsitta badzra sva bh'a ba a'atma konyaham /
T02TD2871E:213a-43: sku gsung thugs su byin brlabs nas //
T02TD2871E:213a-44: mi bskyod sangs rgyas bye snyed rnams //
T02TD2871E:213a-45: spyan drangs mchod dang sdig bshags te //
T02TD2871E:213a-46: rjes su gnang ba gsum ldan gyis //
T02TD2871E:213a-47: dbang bskur byin brlabs gnyis med thim //
T02TD2871E:213a-48: aom shr'i badzra p'a ni h'um ma h'a tsanda sarba dusht'a na /
T02TD2871E:213a-49: sarba buddha sa pa ri w'a ra badzra sa ma ya h'um /
T02TD2871E:213a-50: chos kyi rgyal por dbang bskur ro //
T02TD2871E:213a-51: thugs ka'i ting 'dzin sems dpa' la //
T02TD2871E:213a-52: gtad de sngags kyi phreng bas bskor //
T02TD2871E:213a-53: bdag dang las kyi sems dpa' la //
T02TD2871E:213b-0: spro dang bsdu ba'i rim pa @213b rnams //
T02TD2871E:213b-1: ji lta bar ni gsal bar bsgom //
T02TD2871E:213b-2: bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa yi //
T02TD2871E:213b-3: gsang sngags skyon spangs bzlas par bya //
T02TD2871E:213b-4: bsnyen dus lha la gtad de bzlas //
T02TD2871E:213b-5: sgrub pa'i dus su sngags la gtad //
T02TD2871E:213b-6: bzlas dus gzas pa po rnams la //
T02TD2871E:213b-8: de nas bdag dang rgyan cha yi //
T02TD2871E:213b-9: sprul gyi kha nas sngags bzlas pas //
T02TD2871E:213b-10: me yi 'tshubs ma dmar nag dang //
T02TD2871E:213b-11: khro bo grangs med 'phros pa las //
T02TD2871E:213b-12: de yis de dag bsregs nas kyang //
T02TD2871E:213b-13: lhag ma lus par gyur pa rnams //
T02TD2871E:213b-14: spogs pa yi ni sbyor bas bsreg / de ltar byas nas /
T02TD2871E:213b-16: de nas dang po'i thun thon nas //
T02TD2871E:213b-17: skyo'am du ba na mchod byas te //
T02TD2871E:213b-18: gtor ma byin gyis brlabs te dbul //
T02TD2871E:213b-19: bstod dang phrin las bcol bar bya //
T02TD2871E:213b-20: ji ltar nye bar ma gyur pa //
T02TD2871E:213b-21: ye shes sems dpa' gshegs mi gsol //
T02TD2871E:213b-22: mchod rten sngon po dag la'o //
T02TD2871E:213b-23: thun ni gnyis dang gsum pa la //
T02TD2871E:213b-24: ye shes sems dpa' mchod pa dang //
T02TD2871E:213b-25: thun ni tha ma bsgom pa'i tshe //
T02TD2871E:213b-26: dang po thun ni mthun par gsungs //
T02TD2871E:213b-27: yi ge brgya pas brtan par ya //
T02TD2871E:213b-28: de nas ldang ba'i dus dag tu //
T02TD2871E:213b-29: rig sngags las kyi lha la gtad //
T02TD2871E:213b-30: de ltar ma nor bsgoms byas na //
T02TD2871E:213b-31: dngos grub dam pa ci 'dod pa //
T02TD2871E:213b-33: bsnyen rdzogs mtshan ma bzang ba dang //
T02TD2871E:213b-34: ye shes sems dpa' gshegs mi gsol //
T02TD2871E:213b-35: gshegs na dngos grub yal 'gyur bas //
T02TD2871E:213b-36: lha ni rgyun du 'khor ba yi //
T02TD2871E:213b-37: man ngag zhal las shes par bya //
T02TD2871E:213b-38: gtor ma bka' las phab nas ni //
T02TD2871E:213b-39: gta' yi bdag po mchod byas nas //
T02TD2871E:213b-40: gta' gtor bskul tshigs bcas la gtad //
T02TD2871E:213b-41: bsgrub bya'i phyogs su dmar lam bstan //
T02TD2871E:213b-42: gta' yi bdag po gshegs su gsol //
T02TD2871E:213b-43: las kyi sems dpa' bdag la bsdu //
T02TD2871E:213b-44: h'um h'um zhes bsdu mi dmigs bsgom //
T02TD2871E:213b-45: skad cig ma yi nga rgyal gyis //
T02TD2871E:213b-46: spyod lam ci bder gnas par bya //
T02TD2871E:213b-47: bsnyen rdzogs mtshan ma bzang gyur nas //
T02TD2871E:213b-48: drag po las la sbyar byas te //
T02TD2871E:213b-49: mchod rten sngon po sku gdung ldan //
T02TD2871E:213b-50: me tog sngon po drir bsnyugs kyis //
T02TD2871E:213b-51: nyi shu rtsa gcig tu mchod cing //
T02TD2871E:214a-2: raksha rus pa'i phreng ba bgrang //
T02TD2871E:214a-3: sngags ni brgya dang brgya lnga bcus //
T02TD2871E:214a-4: thun bdun gyis ni rnal 'byor bya /
T02TD2871E:214a-5: rdo rje'am seng ldeng phur pa la //
T02TD2871E:214a-6: gzungs sngags stong rtsa brgyad bzlas te //
T02TD2871E:214a-7: bsam gtan rdo rje thogs pa yi //
T02TD2871E:214a-8: drag sngags lnga bcu rtsa gcig bzlas //
T02TD2871E:214a-9: gzas pa po la bsnun gyur na //
T02TD2871E:214a-10: des ni las rnam thams cad 'grub //
T02TD2871E:214a-11: bdag sa'i 'di byas dge ba yi //
T02TD2871E:214a-12: blo chung rnams kyis don rtogs te //
T02TD2871E:214a-13: 'bad pas tshogs gnyis bsags nas ni //
T02TD2871E:214a-14: phyag na rdo rje thob par shog / phyag na rdo rje mdo lugs kyi man ngag //
T02TD2871E:214a-15: slob dpon su l'a g'i shva ra k'i rtis gzungs kyi 'grel pa ltar mdzad pa 'grel pa las gzungs sgrub thabs su mdzad pa rdzogs so /
T02TD2871E:214a-17: // / rgya gar gyi pandi ta nga'i pamka ra shr'i dzny'a na dang /
T02TD2871E:214a-18: lo ts'a ba rgya brtson 'grus seng ges bsgyur ba'o //
